entry.title: SNOWFALL WARNING , Miramichi
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:39 AM AST Thursday 09 February 2023

entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT ENDED, Miramichi
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:43 AM AST Thursday 09 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -10.5°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Miramichi 04:00 AM AST Thursday 09 February 2023

Pressure / Tendency: 102.0 kPa rising
Humidity: 57 %
Wind Chill: -16
Dewpoint: -17.3°C
Wind: W 10 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Thursday: Sunny. High minus 5.
entry.summary: Sunny. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this afternoon. High minus 5. Wind chill minus 22 this morning and minus 8 this afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM AST Thursday 09 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Snow. Low minus 9.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Snow beginning after midnight. Amount 2 cm. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h before morning. Low minus 9. Wind chill minus 8 this evening and minus 16 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM AST Thursday 09 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: Snow at times heavy mixed with ice pellets. High minus 1.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy becoming mixed with ice pellets near noon. Snow and ice pellet amount 10 to 15 cm. Wind east 20 km/h gusting to 40 except gusting to 60 along parts of the coast in the morning and early in the afternoon. Wind becoming light in the afternoon. High minus 1. Wind chill minus 14 in the morning and minus 5 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 05:00 AM AST Thursday 09 February 2023
